authenticate_user: SELECT * FROM USERS INNER JOIN AVTARS ON AVTAR = AVTAR_ID WHERE USERNAME = ? AND PASSWORD = SHA1(?)
insert_user: INSERT INTO USERS (name, username, email, profession, BIRTHDAY, gender, password) VALUE (?,?,?,?,?,?,SHA1(?))
update_user: UPDATE USERS SET name = ?, profession = ? WHERE user_id = ?
update_user_password: UPDATE USERS SET password = SHA1(?) WHERE user_id = ?
create_account: INSERT INTO USERS (name, username, email, gender, password) VALUE (?, ?, ?, ?, SHA1(?))
update_profile: UPDATE USERS SET PROFESSION = ?, BIRTHDAY = ?, BIO = ?, CITY = ?, STATE = ?, AVTAR = ? WHERE USERNAME = ?
update_profile_birthday: UPDATE USERS SET PROFESSION = ?, BIRTHDAY = NULL, BIO = ?, CITY = ?, STATE = ?, AVTAR = ? WHERE USERNAME = ?
get_user_by_username: SELECT * FROM USERS INNER JOIN AVTARS ON AVTAR = AVTAR_ID WHERE USERNAME = ?
post_topic: INSERT INTO TOPICS (forum_id, title, description, created_by) VALUE (?, ?, ?, ?)
post_reply: INSERT INTO POSTS (topic_id, posted_by, content) VALUE (?, ?, ?)
total_posts_in_forums: SELECT F.FORUM_ID, COUNT(P.POST_ID) AS POSTS FROM FORUMS AS F INNER JOIN TOPICS AS T INNER JOIN POSTS AS P WHERE F.FORUM_ID = T.FORUM_ID AND T.TOPIC_ID = P.TOPIC_ID GROUP BY FORUM_ID
total_topics_in_forums: SELECT F.FORUM_ID, COUNT(T.TOPIC_ID) AS TOPICS FROM FORUMS AS F LEFT JOIN TOPICS AS T USING (FORUM_ID) GROUP BY F.FORUM_ID
all_forums: SELECT C.CATEGORY_ID, C.NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME, C.DESCRIPTION AS CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION, F.FORUM_ID, F.TITLE AS FORUM_TITLE, F.DESCRIPTION AS FORUM_DESCRIPTION, F.DATE_CREATED FROM CATEGORIES AS C INNER JOIN FORUMS AS F WHERE C.CATEGORY_ID = F.CATEGORY_ID AND F.PARENT_FORUM_ID IS NULL
all_topics_in_forum: SELECT T.TOPIC_ID, T.TITLE, T.DESCRIPTION, T.CREATED_DATE, U.USER_ID, U.USERNAME, U.NAME, U.EMAIL, U.PROFESSION, U.BIRTHDAY, U.GENDER FROM TOPICS AS T INNER JOIN USERS AS U ON T.CREATED_BY = U.USER_ID WHERE T.FORUM_ID = ?
all_subforums_in_forum: SELECT FORUM_ID, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, DATE_CREATED FROM FORUMS WHERE parent_forum_id = ?
get_forum: SELECT FORUM_ID, TITLE, DESCRIPTION, DATE_CREATED FROM FORUMS WHERE FORUM_ID = ?
total_posts_in_subforums_in_forum: SELECT F.FORUM_ID, COUNT(P.POST_ID) AS POSTS FROM FORUMS AS F INNER JOIN TOPICS AS T INNER JOIN POSTS AS P WHERE F.FORUM_ID = T.FORUM_ID AND T.TOPIC_ID = P.TOPIC_ID AND F.PARENT_FORUM_ID = ? GROUP BY FORUM_ID
total_topics_in_subforums_in_forum: SELECT F.FORUM_ID, COUNT(T.TOPIC_ID) AS TOPICS FROM FORUMS AS F LEFT JOIN TOPICS AS T USING (FORUM_ID) WHERE F.PARENT_FORUM_ID = ? GROUP BY F.FORUM_ID
total_posts_in_topics_in_forum: SELECT T.TOPIC_ID, COUNT(P.POST_ID) AS POSTS FROM TOPICS AS T INNER JOIN POSTS AS P USING (TOPIC_ID) WHERE T.FORUM_ID = ? GROUP BY TOPIC_ID
get_topic: SELECT F.FORUM_ID, F.TITLE AS FORUM_TITLE, F.DESCRIPTION AS FORUM_DESCRIPTION, F.DATE_CREATED AS FORUM_CREATED_DATE, T.TOPIC_ID, T.TITLE AS TOPIC_TITLE, T.DESCRIPTION AS TOPIC_DESCRIPTION, T.CREATED_DATE AS TOPIC_CREATED_DATE, U.USER_ID, U.USERNAME, U.NAME, U.EMAIL, U.PROFESSION, U.BIRTHDAY, U.GENDER FROM TOPICS AS T INNER JOIN USERS AS U ON created_by = USER_ID INNER JOIN FORUMS AS F USING (FORUM_ID) WHERE TOPIC_ID = ?;
get_posts_in_topic: SELECT POST_ID, CONTENT, DATE_POSTED, USER_ID, USERNAME, EMAIL, PROFESSION, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, NAME, IMAGE_URL, AVTAR_ID FROM POSTS INNER JOIN USERS ON POSTED_BY = USER_ID INNER JOIN AVTARS ON AVTAR = AVTAR_ID WHERE TOPIC_ID = ?;
